title: Fix beam-text centering and beams performance in sysc-Go
description:
1. beam-text: Change line 207 in beamtext.go to center each line individually instead of left-aligning from longest line offset. Each line should calculate its own startX based on its own length.

2. beams: Optimize performance by reducing character count. Currently creates width*height characters (12k+ on fullscreen). Consider sparse sampling or only creating characters where beams are active.

3. beams: Verify rendering across entire screen dimensions.
